io.github.trulyfree.modular.action

Interface Action

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionHandler<T>, PrioritizedAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundPrioritizedActionHandler, GeneralizedActionHandler, PrioritizedActionHandler

    public interface Action
    Action main interface. All operations which do not need to be enacted immediately should be a simple implementation of this interface, and should be handled by a ActionHandler.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean enact()
      Method to be called in order to enact the operations desired.

    • Method Detail

      • enact

        boolean enact()
        Method to be called in order to enact the operations desired. Think of this method as synonymous with Runnable's "run", except that this returns a boolean if the operation is successful. This method should not cause any throwables to be thrown. Instead, all throwables should be handled within this method. If the action is cancelled, throws a fatal throwable, or is for any other reason not successfully completed, it should catch any thrown throwables and return false.
        Returns:
        success The success of this operation. If the action fails to be enacted for any reason, this should return false.
